level.heading: Replacement of equipment.
level.text: No later than October 1, 2007, the Office of Unified Communications shall establish a schedule for the replacement of equipment for the 911 system. The schedule shall be updated on February 1 of each subsequent year.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 3022(c) of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-20, see notes following ยง 34-1514.
